text: Huey Percy Newton (February 17, 1942 - August 22, 1989) was an African- American communist political activist. Along with Bobby Seale, he co-founded the Black Panther Party in 1966. In 1989, he was shot and killed during a drug deal in Oakland, California, aged 47.'Arrest in Murder of Huey Newton'; New York Times, 26 August 1989 Huey Newton had one biological child Rico Cortez Dukes According to Alameda Oakland California Vital Court Records. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:1989 deaths Category:American murder victims Category:Murders by firearm in California Category:American political activists Category:American communists Category:Writers from Louisiana Category:Politicians from Louisiana
title: Huey P. Newton
